content: this pattern originally appeared in mccall s magazine in 1984 and was donated to p/hop in 2011 by the designers joanna osborne and sally muir to raise money for médécins sans frontières/doctors without borders msf please download the pattern and make a donation to p/hop based on how many hours of pleasure you think you ll get from knitting the pattern p/hop = pennies per hour of pleasure *if you download the pdf using a mobile device you may have to click on about this capture and then on the url on the drop-down bar in order to open the pattern fully *
